snippet: The Justice Department has reached a settlement with the North Broward Hospital District, which was accused of having improper financial ties with doctors who referred patients to the district.
abstract: Justice Department and North Broward Hospital District, South Florida, reach $69.5 million settlement in lawsuit alleging illegal financial relationships between referring doctors and district facilities; Dr Michael Reilly, who initiated suit, will receive more than $12 million.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department has reached a settlement with the North Broward Hospital District, which was accused of having improper financial ties with doctors who referred patients to the district.

headline.print_headline: Florida Hospital District to Pay $69.5. Million to Settle Lawsuit
headline.main: Florida Hospital District to Pay $69.5 Million to Settle Lawsuit
